column1: // config file listing all available Visa measurement devices in room/lab Sxxx (playground for several labs)
// required columns
//   Device     : char array as unique identifier
//   Instrument : one of the following classes: Scope
//                RFSigGen
//   Type       : visa-usb or visa-tcpip only
//   RsrcName   : regexp mathing the visa resource name
//                'USB0::0x<VID>::0x<PID>::<SID>' for visa-usb (select all serial IDs (SID) by regexp \w*)
//                'TCPIP0::<ipaddress>'           for visa-tcpip
//   OutBufSize : positive integer
column2: specififying size of output buffer (512 is default)

column1: //   InBufSize  : positive integer
column2: specififying size of input buffer  (512 is default)

column1: //   Extrawait  : float in range 0 .. 1
column2: additional wait time (in s) between Visa write and read for visa

column1: //                query
column2: set to 0 (default) for all devices except Siglent DC Power Supplay SPD3303X

column1: // use double-semikolon to separate columns (not allowed in header of table)
// use # to comment out lines in actual table
Device           ;; Vendor  ;; Product ;; Instrument ;; Type      ;; RsrcName                  ;; OutBufSize;; InBufSize
# OutBufSize: longest command is unknown ==> define a large default value
# InBufSize : longest command is unknown ==> define a large default value
# Agilent Signal Generator (more powerful than 33220A)
Agilent-33511B   ;; Agilent ;; Gen33511B  ;; FGen    ;; visa-usb  ;; USB0::0x0957::0x2707::\w+ ;;     2.1e6 ;;    100e3
# Keysight Scope
Keysight-DSOX1102A;; Keysight ;; DSOX1000 ;; Scope   ;; visa-usb  ;; USB0::0x2A8D::0x1787::\w+ ;;      20e3 ;;      2e6
# Rigol Scope
# OutBufSize: longest command is unknown ==> define a large default value
# InBufSize : longest command is unknown ==> define a large default value
#             probably download of waveform data or screenshot (BMP-file?)
Rigol-DS2072A    ;; Rigol   ;; DS2072A ;; Scope      ;; visa-usb  ;; USB0::0x1AB1::0x04B0::\w+ ;;      20e3 ;;      2e6
